ActorTalk: First is Aegina, a member of the Engineering Force. She was near the guild warehouse when the incident happened.
My name is Aegina.
Routine structural inspection.
Commandant, I confirmed with Karenina. Aegina's statement checks out. Merchants nearby also said she was doing inspections with them.
Let me get back to work.
Next is Mr. Grey, manager of the Genius Board Game Shop. He was seen wandering near the warehouse at the time.
Ah, the unstoppable Gray Raven Commandant, and the valiant Miss Lucia! An honor to meet you both. I am Grey Alfred, a humble traveler of the Commercial District.
The human mind is like an ancient riverbed. At that moment, my river of inspiration had dried up. I wandered, pleading for the Muses to look my way.
Mr. Grey was standing in front of the warehouse asking passersby for "story inspiration." The Commercial District's tip line confirms his story.
The third suspect is Jos, an employee of Mark Industries. She was spotted near the warehouse before the theft.
I was talking to customers about shipment shares. You can go ask—
Me? I don't remember that. Where exactly?
Tch, just my rotten luck...!
Commandant, look out—!
Lucia, flank her.
Commandant, based on statements from nearby merchants, Aegina had no time window to commit the crime.
Oh! What a dramatic twist! I feel the darkness of the soul descending! The poet goes to jail while the villain walks free!
Commandant, Mr. Grey's behavior may be... eccentric, but multiple sources confirm he had no opportunity to commit the crime.
Introduce yourself.
What were you doing at the time?
You're the one who stole the spices!
Let's move on to the next one.
Hold on...
Haven't I seen you somewhere before?
You were talking about a missing "list."
You're with the Flourish Guild.
